allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove unused variables for deployment

Removed unused state variables and constants that were causing
Vercel build failures due to ESLint treating warnings as errors:
- achievements
- interests, setInterests, newInterest, setNewInterest
- newEventTime, setNewEventTime  
- cards, setCards, cardNum, setCardNum, cardExp, setCardExp
- cardCvc, setCardCvc, showAddCard, setShowAddCard
- showConfetti, setShowConfetti
- allInterestsList, timeOptions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
